sourcesContent:
Drishya Dinesh

web Developer

Download CV

Hello, I am Drishya

About me

An aspiring full stack developer to kickstart tech career from India , Now in Toronto. I strongly believe to have a true passion that makes us really satisfies at the end of a day over a place where you constatntly pass your time looking at a clock

I can't say that i am well experienced with technologies,web services and frameworks that makes the job faster and efficient but I am quite impressed by the journey of development,thus I am still learning. Software developement is a vast world,indeed ! and its still expanding. I no longer wish to stay back home and watch the community deliver products and services that proves the advancement of technologies now, rather I'd want to contribute my own to an addition.

here I go looking up for opprotunities.
